mapper.select:
select c.crte_time, d.visit_no, a.is_skin, a.id as opdId, e.id, c.visit_id, e.is_positive, e.skin_result_code, a.item_id, a.item_name, b.name as execDeptName, e.exec_id, e.exec_name, e.exec_dept_id, e.exec_date, c.doctor_name, c.dept_name, d.name,d.age,d.age_unit_code,d.gender_code, e.remark from outpt_prescribe_detail a inner JOIN outpt_prescribe c on a.op_id = c.id and a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and a.visit_id inner JOIN outpt_visit d on a.visit_id = d.id and a.hosp_code = d.hosp_code left JOIN outpt_skin_result e on a.visit_id = e.visit_id and a.hosp_code = e.hosp_code and a.id = e.opd_id left JOIN base_dept b on b.hosp_code = a.hosp_code and e.exec_dept_id = b.id
(d.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or d.visit_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or d.cert_no like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and e.is_positive is not null
and e.is_positive is null
and DATE_FORMAT(c.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.crte_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_skin = '1' and c.is_settle = '1' and c.is_cancel = '0'
order by c.crte_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into outpt_skin_result(id, hosp_code, opd_id, visit_id, skin_durg_id, skin_durg_name, is_positive, skin_result_code, exec_dept_id, exec_date, exec_id, exec_name, remark) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{opdId}, #{visitId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{isPositive}, #{skinResultCode}, #{execDeptId}, #{execDate}, #{execId}, #{execName}, #{remark})
